name: Halloween Blows
description:
Halloween Blows is a game made for Sykoo's Polyrealm Halloween Jam.

It's a wack-a-mole style game but instead of wacking moles you're blowing out Jack-O-Lanterns.

Instructions:

Use your mouse to point and click at the lit Jack-O-Lanterns.

Be careful! If you hit an unlit Jack-O-Lantern you will lose points.

You have 2 minutes! Get as much points as you can!

The quitting feature doesn't work in WebGL(If you're playing the game on a browser).

Post your high score in the comments!
